articles.content:

articles.title: Third stimulus bill: The American Rescue Plan moves through Congress - Vox

articles.description: The lowest-income Americans would see an after-tax income boost of about 20% from the Biden coronavirus relief plan, an analysis found.
articles.title: Biden Covid relief plan gives bigger boost to lower-income Americans than Trump tax cuts, study says - CNBC
